alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 6:03PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Ashley County through 700 PM CST... At 603 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Old Milo, or 8 miles northwest of North Crossett, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Old Milo around 610 PM CST. Fountain Hill around 615 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Blanchton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
